name: control(_:textView:completions:forPartialWordRange:indexOfSelectedItem:)
desc: Invoked to allow you to control the list of proposed text completions generated by text fields and other controls.
declaration:
optional func control(_ control: NSControl, 
             textView: NSTextView, 
          completions words: [String], 
  forPartialWordRange charRange: NSRange, 
  indexOfSelectedItem index: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>) -> [String]
